name: merezhyvo
description: Minimal Chromium-based browser for Ubuntu Touch built with Electron and React.
author: Naz.R

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:static && npm run build:renderer
scripts.package:electron: npm run build && npx electron-packager . merezhyvo --platform=linux --arch=arm64 --out=app-bin --overwrite --asar --icon=merezhyvo_256.png
scripts.package: npm run package:electron && npm run stage
scripts.start:wayland: npm run build && OZONE_PLATFORM=wayland XCURSOR_SIZE=24 electron electron/main.js
